featured.text: It is caused by disruption to the internal biological clock, and may lead to digestive problems, tiredness, and sleep disruption.
The soybean’s high fiber content is beneficial in preventing digestive disorders.

definition.zh_def: 消化的，與消化過程有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the process of digesting food.
definition.example: The digestive system breaks down food into nutrients.
